meanings.definition: A type of marine protozoan with a mineral skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The radiolaria drifted gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study radiolaria to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The radiolaria threw a tiny party in their mineral homes.
meanings.sent4: The radiolaria's mineral skeleton was as delicate as spun sugar.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, radiolaria look like tiny jewels of the sea.

meanings.definition: The group of marine protozoans to which radiolarians belong.
meanings.sent1: Many different species make up the radiolaria group.
meanings.sent2: The radiolaria group includes various types of marine life.
meanings.sent3: At the marine meeting, the radiolaria group discussed ocean matters.
meanings.sent4: The radiolaria group is like a big family living in the sea.
meanings.sent5: In the vast ocean, the radiolaria group thrives together.
